ISEBE LAMASHISHINI OLUNTU: UBUME






UBUME



USHICILELO



AMAQUMRHU KAHULUMENTE



UQHAGAMSHELWANO




ISebe lamaShishini oLuntu linoxanduva lokukhokela nokulawula uhlengahlengiso olukhawulezileyo lwamashishini angawombuso ukuze kuphuculwe kangangoko okuxatyiswe ngumnini-zabelo.

Eli Sebe lineenkqubo ezintandathu:
* INkqubo 1: UkuLawula nokuPhatha
  Le nkqubo inoxanduva lokusingatha zonke iinkqubo zokukhokela nokulawula eli Sebe kunye neCandelo loMphathiswa. Le nkqubo iquka iCandelo loMphathiswa, iOfisi yoMlawuli-Jikelele, ezoQhagamshelwano, icandelo loPhicotho lwangaphakathi kunye neCandelo loMlawuli oyiNtloko yeeNkonzo ezidityanelweyo.
* Inkqubo 2(a): UHlengahlengiso lwamaShishini angawoMbuso
  Le nkqubo yiyo equlunqa kananjalo isungule inkqubo yohlengahlengiso ukuze kuhlangabezwane neenjongo zikaRhulumente ngokubhekiselele kwezoqoqosho. Linamacandelo angala: elezaMandla noNxibelelwano ngeMinxeba, elezoThutho, elezokuQulunqwa kweeNkqubo zeziMali, nelezokuHlalutya iiNgxaki ezi
